      • getMovingState

        public int getMovingState()
        获取beacon运动状态
        get the moving state of beacon
        返回:
        运动状态
        返回 Integer.MAX_VALUE 表示无加速度传感器或加速度传感器已关闭
        moving state
        return Integer.MAX_VALUE means no accelerator sensor or accelerator sensor disabled

        get the hardware model name of beacon

        hardware mode name(only support A0 beacon and B0 beacon in cunrrent)

      • getTemperature

        public int getTemperature()
        获取当前环境温度
        get the environment temperature of beacon
        返回:
        温度值(单位:摄氏度)
        返回 Integer.MAX_VALUE 表示无温度传感器或温度传感器已关闭
        the value of temperature(unit:℃)
        return Integer.MAX_VALUE means no temperature sensor or temperature sensor disabled

      • getBrightnessLux

        public double getBrightnessLux()
        获取光线照度
        get the light intensity of illumination
        返回:
        光线照度值(单位:勒克斯)
        返回 Integer.MAX_VALUE 表示无光线传感器或光线传感器已关闭
        light intensity of illumination(unit:lux)
        return Integer.MAX_VALUE means no light sensor or light sensor disabled

      • getAccelerometerCount

        public int getAccelerometerCount()
        获取beacon加速度计数器触发次数
        get the trigger counts number of acceleration sensor of beacon
        返回:
        加速度计数器触发次数
        返回 Integer.MAX_VALUE 表示无加速度传感器或加速度传感器已关闭
        trigger count of acceleration sensor
        return Integer.MAX_VALUE means no accelerator sensor or accelerator sensor disabled
